pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit a Penalized Continuation Ratio Model for Predicting an Ordinal Response // Provides a function for fitting a penalized constrained continuation ratio model using the glmpath algorithm and methods for extracting coefficient estimates, predicted class, class probabilities, and plots.See Kellie J. Archer, Andre A.A. Williams (2012) L1 Penalized Continuation Ratio Models for Ordinal Response Prediction Using High- dimensional Datasets, Statistics in Medicine 31, 1464-1474 doi:10.1002/sim.4484.
